iati-activity.title: TRP - RECOVERY COORDI.INITIATI
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Recovery Coordinated Initiativ Long Description: (1) Sustainable livelihood opportunities created for crisis affected communities; (2) Micro-credit and micro enterprise development support provided to vulnerable communities and individuals with limited access to credit; (3) Community focused housing provided to crisis affected communities; (4) Access of crisis affected communities to socio-economic services enhanced through rehabilitation of community infrastructure; (5) Enhanced social cohesion and gender empowerment across and within communities in crisis affected areas; (6) Community environmental management mainstreamed into the recovery process of crisis affected communities

iati-activity.title: Green Belt Redevelopment of To
iati-activity.description: Short Description: This project aims to support the Government of Sri Lanka in the sustainable development of high quality tourism infrastructure and facilities in 25 designated coastal tourism zones under the jurisdiction of the SLTB; all of which were affected by tsunami Long Description: This project aims to support the Government of Sri Lanka in the sustainable development of high quality tourism infrastructure and facilities in 25 designated coastal tourism zones under the jurisdiction of the Sri Lanka Tourism Board; all of which were affected in some way by the Tsunami (in terms of loss of life; material destruction; loss of livelihoods; and loss of revenue from tourism); by developing; among others: Specifically the project would develop:_x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ A comprehensive general and area-specific development guidelines for the coastal tourism zones with practical and realistic set back requirements;_x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ And make proposals for _x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ Increased local community participation and better livelihood opportunities;_x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ The project will provide recommendations for concentrating future coastal tourism facilities in the 25zones; to develop a symbiotic relationship with existing small towns and villages in or close by these zones and to foster a policy of developing high quality coastal tourism products; thereby creating more and better livelihood opportunities for the local population and contributing towards the eradication of coastal and rural poverty.

iati-activity.title: Enhanced Womens' Political Rep
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Enhanced Women's Political Representation and Participation in Decision -Making Long Description: 1) enhanced capacities of activist women by developing their leadership; negotiation; networking; planning and other relevant skills in support of their participation in decision-making processes; national reconciliation processes; and entry into governance institutions; 2) sensitization of the key stakeholder groups including political parties; press; civil society and the general public; on the key issues related to women’s political empowerment and 3) stock-taking exercise conducted on the research and advocacy work undertaken.
